mapper.select: SELECT group_concat(buyer_id,":",seller_id) FROM belong_relationship where status = 3 and seller_id = #{sellerId} and buyer_id != 0 and seller_id != 0
SELECT distinct(company_name) FROM member_company_info where member_id != 0 AND member_id = #{sellerId} limit 0,1
SELECT group_concat(buyer_id,":",seller_id) FROM zeus.box_relationship WHERE buyer_id != 0 and seller_id != 0 and delete_flag = 0 and seller_id = #{sellerId}
SELECT is_visable FROM item_sku_publish_info WHERE item_id = #{itemId} and is_box_flag=#{isBox} limit 0,1
SELECT distinct(parent_code) from base_address WHERE code = #{areaCode} AND level = 3
SELECT distinct(seller_type) FROM member_base_info WHERE id != 0 AND id = #{sellerId} limit 0,1
SELECT distinct(ids.describe_content) from item_describe ids inner join item i on i.item_id = ids.item_id where ids.item_id = #{itemId} limit 0,1
SELECT sum(sales_goods_count) FROM shop_sales_analysis_day_report WHERE item_code = #{itemCode}
SELECT min(price) FROM item_sku_ladder_price WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT isad.area_code FROM item_sales_area_detail AS isad INNER JOIN item_sales_area AS isa ON isa.sales_area_id = isad.sales_area_id WHERE isa.is_box_flag = #{isBox} AND isa.item_id = #{itemId} AND isad.delete_flag = 0 AND isa.delete_flag = 0 group by isad.area_code
SELECT distinct(is_sales_whole_country) FROM zeus.item_sales_area WHERE delete_flag = 0 and is_box_flag = #{isBox} and item_id = #{itemId} limit 0,1
SELECT id, code, parent_code as parentCode FROM base_address WHERE level = 3 And delete_flag = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM item WHERE item_status = 5 AND item_id = #{itemId} limit 0,1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM item_sku_publish_info WHERE is_visable = 1 AND item_id =#{itemId}

SELECT srp.product_code as productCode,group_concat(srw.hot_word) as hotWord FROM search_recommend AS sr INNER JOIN search_recommend_product AS srp ON srp.recommend_word_id = sr.id INNER JOIN search_recommend_word AS srw ON srw.recommend_word_id = sr.id WHERE srw.hot_word != "" and srp.product_code = #{itemCode} GROUP by srp.product_code
SELECT picture_url FROM zeus.item_picture WHERE is_first = 1 AND delete_flag = 0 AND picture_status = 1 AND item_id = #{itemId} limit 0,1
SELECT picture_url FROM item_picture WHERE picture_id = (SELECT min(ip.picture_id) FROM item_picture AS ip WHERE ip.item_id = #{itemId}) limit 0,1

SELECT group_concat(isad.area_code) as areaCodes, isa.is_box_flag as isBox, isa.item_id as itemId FROM item_sales_area_detail AS isad INNER JOIN item_sales_area AS isa ON isa.sales_area_id = isad.sales_area_id where isad.area_code != 0 AND isa.delete_flag = 0 AND isa.is_sales_whole_country != 1 AND isad.delete_flag = 0 group by isa.is_box_flag,isa.item_id
SELECT c_name FROM item_category WHERE cid = #{cid} limit 0,1
SELECT brand_name FROM item_brand WHERE brand_id = #{brandId} limit 0,1

SELECT ia.attr_id, ia.attr_name as attrName FROM item_attribute ia,item_category_attr ica WHERE ia.attr_id = ica.attr_id AND ica.attr_type = 2 AND ia.status = 1 AND ica.status = 1 AND ica.cid = #{cid}

SELECT distinct(iav.value_id) as valueId, iav.value_name as valueName FROM item_attribute_value iav, item_category_attr_value icav WHERE iav.value_id = icav.value_id AND iav.status = 1 AND icav.status = 1 AND icav.attr_id = #{attrId} AND icav.cid = #{cid}
